_comment: Sample epic for user story generation. Customize scope and requirements for your product.
name: Advanced Reporting Dashboard
description: Build a comprehensive reporting dashboard that enables product managers, marketers, and executives to visualize key metrics, create custom reports, and make data-driven decisions without requiring technical expertise.
scope: Create dashboard layout with customizable widgets
Display key metrics (MAU, DAU, conversion rate, churn)
Build report builder for custom queries
Export reports to PDF and Excel formats
Set up automated daily/weekly email reports
technical_requirements: Set up caching layer for performance
Design scalable database schema for metrics storage
Create API endpoints for report generation
success_criteria: Enable 95% of use cases without custom SQL
Achieve 90% user adoption within first month
Reduce time to insight from 1 hour to 5 minutes
business_impact: Enable faster decision-making across the organization, reduce dependency on data team for ad-hoc reporting
